statements: SELECT * FROM PurchaseData ORDER BY purchase_date DESC, purchase_id ASC;
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM PurchaseData WHERE unit_price > 10;
SELECT AVG(unit_price) AS avg_price FROM PurchaseData WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM PurchaseData GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT purchase_id, purchase_date FROM PurchaseData WHERE product_id = 2 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM PurchaseData ORDER BY purchase_date DESC, unit_price ASC, quantity DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT purchase_id, product_id, quantity, unit_price FROM PurchaseData WHERE unit_price > 50 ORDER BY purchase_id ASC;
SELECT purchase_id, product_id, purchase_date FROM PurchaseData WHERE quantity > 5 AND unit_price BETWEEN 10 AND 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM PurchaseData WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY quantity DESC, unit_price ASC;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity_sold FROM PurchaseData GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY total_quantity_sold DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM purchases;
SELECT purchase_id, product_id, purchase_date, quantity, price FROM purchases;
SELECT purchase_id, purchase_date, product_id, quantity, price FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price, in_stock FROM products;
SELECT product_id, product_name, supplier_id, price, in_stock FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE in_stock > 0 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT product_name, price, supplier_id FROM products WHERE price < 50 AND supplier_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT purchase_id, purchase_date, quantity FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND quantity > 10 ORDER BY purchase_date;
SELECT * FROM purchases p JOIN products pr ON p.product_id = pr.product_id WHERE p.quantity >= 50 AND pr.price < 100 ORDER BY p.purchase_date ASC, pr.product_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM purchases;
SELECT purchase_id, product_id, purchase_date, quantity, price FROM purchases WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price < 50;
SELECT supplier_name, location, contact_email FROM suppliers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT product_name, category, supplier_name, price FROM products p JOIN suppliers s ON p.supplier_id = s.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT p.product_name, s.supplier_name, p.price FROM products p INNER JOIN suppliers s ON p.supplier_id = s.supplier_id
SELECT purchase_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity, SUM(price) AS total_price FROM purchases GROUP BY purchase_id HAVING total_quantity > 5
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM suppliers s INNER JOIN products p ON s.supplier_id = p.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name ORDER BY total_products DESC
SELECT * FROM Orders;
SELECT customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category, unit_price FROM Products ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM Customers WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%555%';
SELECT sale_id, order_id, product_id, quantity, sale_date FROM Sales WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT order_date, total_amount FROM Orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, quantity FROM Customers c JOIN Orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN Sales s ON o.order_id = s.order_id JOIN Products p ON s.product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_city, customer_country FROM customers;
SELECT product_name, product_price, product_stock_quantity FROM products WHERE category_id = 2;
SELECT purchase_id, customer_id, product_id, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT forecast_date, product_id, demand_forecast FROM forecasts WHERE forecast_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_price, category_name FROM products p JOIN categories c ON p.category_id = c.category_id WHERE product_stock_quantity > 0;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_city, customer_country FROM customers WHERE customer_country = 'USA';
SELECT purchase_id, customer_name, product_name, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM purchases p JOIN customers c ON p.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN products pr ON p.product_id = pr.product_id;
SELECT forecast_id, forecast_date, demand_forecast FROM forecasts WHERE product_id = 1 ORDER BY forecast_date ASC;
